text: Angus Alexander Geoffrey Trumble (Born 6 October 1964 â€“ Died 8 October 2022) was an Australian scholar, art curator, and author. ==Life== He was the director of the National Portrait Gallery of Australia, a senior research fellow at the National Museum of Australia, a curator at Yale University's Centre for British Art and the Art Gallery of South Australia, and the author of books including A Brief History of the Smile and The Finger: A Handbook. He died on 8 October 2022, two days after his 58th birthday. Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian people
title: Angus Trumble
